text: Now on the third day there was a wedding at Cana in Galilee. Jesus’ mother was there,

<st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> were <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1062" class="">wedding</st>.<n id="1" />

When the <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="5302">ran out</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “They <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> left.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1135">Woman</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> saying this to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2240" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st>.”
His mother told the servants, “Whatever he tells you, do it.”
Now there were six stone water jars there for Jewish ceremonial washing, each holding 20 or 30 gallons.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">servants</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1072" class="">Fill</st> the <st data-num="5201">water jars</st> with <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>.” <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="1072" class="">filled</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">up to</st> the very <st data-num="507" class="">top</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3568" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="501" class="">draw</st> some <st data-num="501" class="">out</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">take</st> it to the <st data-num="755">head steward</st>,”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="5342" class="">did</st>.

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="755" class="">head steward</st> <st data-num="1089" class="">tasted</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> that had been <st data-num="1096" class="">turned</st> to <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knowing</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> it <st data-num="1510">came</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">from</st><n id="2" /> (<st data-num="1161">though</st> the <st data-num="1249" class="">servants</st> who had <st data-num="501" class="">drawn</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knew)</st>, <st data-num="755" class="">he</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5087" class="">serves</st> the <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then the <st data-num="1640">cheaper</st><n id="2" /> wine <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> the guests<n id="3" /> are <st data-num="3184" class="">drunk</st>. <st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> have <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> the <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st>!”
Jesus did this as the first of his miraculous signs, in Cana of Galilee. In this way he revealed his glory, and his disciples believed in him.
After this he went down to Capernaum with his mother and brothers and his disciples, and they stayed there a few days.
Now the Jewish Feast of Passover was near, so Jesus went up to Jerusalem.
He found in the temple courts those who were selling oxen and sheep and doves, and the money changers sitting at tables.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> a <st data-num="5416" class="">whip</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4979" class="">cords</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="1544" class="">drove</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5037">with</st> the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1016" class="">oxen</st>. He <st data-num="1632" class="">scattered</st> the <st data-num="2772" class="">coins</st> of the <st data-num="2855">money changers</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="396" class="">overturned</st> their <st data-num="5132" class="">tables</st>.

To those who <st data-num="4453" class="">sold</st> the <st data-num="4058" class="">doves</st> he <st data-num="3005">said</st>, “<st data-num="142" class="">Take</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="142" class="">away</st> <st data-num="1782">from here</st>! Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962">Father’s</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> a <st data-num="1712" class="">marketplace</st>!”<n id="2" />
His disciples remembered that it was written, “Zeal for your house will devour me.”
So then the Jewish leaders responded, “What sign can you show us, since you are doing these things?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3089">Destroy</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> I will <st data-num="1453" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">up</st> again.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="2453">Jewish leaders</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to him, “<st data-num="4778">This</st> <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> has been under <st data-num="3618" class="">construction</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="5062 1803">46</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> going to <st data-num="1453" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1565">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="3004" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>.<n id="2" />
So after he was raised from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this, and they believed the scripture and the saying that Jesus had spoken.
Now while Jesus was in Jerusalem at the Feast of the Passover, many people believed in his name because they saw the miraculous signs he was doing.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">entrust</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3956">all people</st>.<n id="1" />
He did not need anyone to testify about man, for he knew what was in man.
